    • Uses of RunnableEntity in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation

      Subinterfaces of RunnableEntity in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  NetworkOperation
      This interface defines methods to simulate a data transmission operation between two Jobs through a given route in the network.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation that implement RunnableEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetworkOperationDefault
      This implementation will automatically find a new Route using the RoutingProtocol on the host of the parent job's VM each time it is activated.

      class  ComputingOperationDefault
      This implementation will automatically seek a ProcessingUnit from the parent job's VM each time it is activated.

    • Uses of RunnableEntity in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.storage.operation

      Subinterfaces of RunnableEntity in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.storage.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  StorageOperation
      This interface defines methods to simulate a storage operation on a given StorageFile.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.storage.operation that implement RunnableEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StorageOperationDefault
      This implementations uses, when its StorageFile is located in a remote host, a OperationSynchronizer in order to synchronize this storage operation with the network operation.
      When a remote job is needed, it is created under a new VM or, if the remote host is a ThinClient, using its main vm.

    • Uses of RunnableEntity in com.samysadi.acs.service.checkpointing

      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.service.checkpointing with type parameters of type RunnableEntity 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CheckpointingHandler<E extends RunnableEntity,C extends Checkpoint<E,?>>
      This interface defines methods to register a RunnableEntity for automatic checkpointing and recovery.
      class  CheckpointingHandlerAbstract<E extends RunnableEntity,C extends Checkpoint<E,?>>
      This is an abstract implementation of the CheckpointingHandler which keeps one checkpoint per registered entity and updates it automatically.
      This implementation will also automatically recover a registered RunnableEntity whenever it fails.
      Additionally, if any parent of the MemoryZone (e.g.

    • Uses of RunnableEntity in com.samysadi.acs.service.checkpointing.checkpoint

      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.service.checkpointing.checkpoint with type parameters of type RunnableEntity 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Checkpoint<E extends RunnableEntity,P extends Entity>
      A checkpoint is a snapshot of the running state of a RunnableEntity at a given moment of the simulation.
      After that a checkpoint is created and updated, it can then be used at any other moment of the simulation to create a copy of the RunnableEntity which was used to update the checkpoint.
      class  CheckpointAbstract<E extends RunnableEntity,P extends Entity>
      Abstract class for checkpoints.

    • Uses of RunnableEntity in com.samysadi.acs.user

      Subinterfaces of RunnableEntity in com.samysadi.acs.user 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ThinClientVirtualMachine
      A thin client VM is different from regular VMs because you cannot allocate some resources types for it (virtual ram, virtual storage, processing units).
      If you try to allocate such resources you will get an UnsupportedOperationException.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.user that implement RunnableEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ThinClientVirtualMachineDefault

    • Uses of RunnableEntity in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation

      Subinterfaces of RunnableEntity in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  LongOperation<Resource extends LongResource>
      This interface defines an Operation that uses a LongResource.
      interface  Operation<Resource>
      An operation is RunnableEntity that needs a certain amount of running time in order to be completed.
      The needed running time directly depends on the allocated resource for the operation.
      interface  RemoteOperation<Resource>
      This interface describes an Operation that has also a destination Job.
      interface  SynchronizableOperation<Resource>
      An operation that can be synchronized with other operations.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation that implement RunnableEntity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LongOperationImpl<Resource extends LongResource>
      This is the default implementation of the LongOperation interface.
      class  OperationImpl<Resource> 
      class  SynchronizableLongOperationImpl<Resource extends LongResource>
      A LongOperationImpl that implements the SynchronizableOperation interface.
      class  TimerOperation
      A operation that runs for a given delay, then becomes completed.
